Synthesizers and Synergistic: While learning has evolved immensely from spray and pray approaches, the future is Learner led â€“ the answers will come by to learners, however you need L&D professionals to synthesize and channelize discussions. And what if that happens even before an event occurs / even before my customer approaches me with a problem? L&D shall comprise teams of business savvy statisticians and anthropologists who look at data differently, more creatively, organize and study learner patterns or where is the learner spending time most? What drives them crazy at work and help them with relevant content?

Vidya Santhanam is Program Director, Organization Development at Mindtree. With a strong leadership connect and interpersonal skills, her forte is in identifying high potential leaders for Top Talent Development Programs.
